Label: Respondent sequence number
Comment: Respondent sequence number.

Label: Age when first menstrual period occurred
Comment: The next series of questions are about {your/SP's} reproductive history.  I will begin by asking about {your/SP's} periods or menstrual cycles.  How old {were you/was SP} when {you/SP} had {your/her} first menstrual period?
Note: CODE '0' IF HAVEN'T STARTED YET.  CAPI INSTRUCTION: SOFT EDIT VALUES: 8-25 YEARS.  HARD EDIT VALUES:  AGE OF 1ST PERIOD CANNOT BE GREATER THAN CURRENT AGE.  ENTER AGE IN YEARS.

Label: Age range at first menstrual period
Comment: {Were you/Was SP}...

Label: Had regular periods in past 12 months
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} had at least one menstrual period in the past 12 months? (Please do not include bleedings caused by medical conditions, hormone therapy, or surgeries.)

Label: Reason not having regular periods
Comment: What is the reason that {you have/SP has} not had a period in the past 12 months?

Label: Age at last menstrual period
Comment: About how old {were you/was SP} when {you/SP} had {your/her} last menstrual period?

Label: Age range at last menstrual period
Comment: {Were you/Was SP}...

Label: Tried for a year to become pregnant?
Comment: The next questions are about {your/SP's} pregnancy history. {Have you/Has SP} ever attempted to become pregnant over a period of at least a year without becoming pregnant?

Label: Seen a DR b/c unable to become pregnant?
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} ever been to a doctor or other medical provider because {you have/she has} been unable to become pregnant?

Label: Ever treated for a pelvic infection/PID?
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} ever been treated for an infection in {your/her} fallopian tubes, uterus or ovaries, also called a pelvic infection, pelvic inflammatory disease, or PID?

Label: Ever been pregnant?
Comment: The next questions are about {your/SP's} pregnancy history. {Have you/Has SP ever been pregnant? Please include (current pregnancy,) live births, miscarriages, stillbirths, tubal pregnancies and abortions.

Label: Are you pregnant now?
Comment: {Are you/Is SP} pregnant now?

Label: How many times have been pregnant?
Comment: How many times {have you/has SP} been pregnant?  ({Again, be/Be} sure to count all {your/her} pregnancies including (current pregnancy,) live births, miscarriages, stillbirths, tubal pregnancies or abortions.)

Label: During pregnancy, told you have diabetes
Comment: During {any/your/SP's} pregnancy, {were you/was SP} ever told by a doctor or other health professional that {you/she} had diabetes, sugar diabetes or gestational diabetes?  Please do not include diabetes that {you/SP} may have known about before the pregnancy.
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF RHQ160 = 1, DISPLAY {your/SP's}.  OTHERWISE, DISPLAY {any}.

Label: Age told you had diabetes while pregnant
Comment: How old {were you/was SP} when {you were/she was} first told {you/she} had diabetes during a pregnancy?
Note: SOFT EDIT: IF RHD143 = 1 AND RHQ160 = 1, THEN RHQ163 must be equal to the age of the SP or the age of the SP minus 1. Error message: 'It is unlikely you were first told you had diabetes at that age since this is your first pregnancy. Please verify.' HARD EDIT: RHQ163 must be equal to or less than age of SP. Error message: 'Age cannot be greater than age of SP.' SOFT EDIT: RHQ163 must be equal to or greater than 12. Error message: 'Unlikely age. Please verify.' ENTER AGE IN YEARS.

Label: How many vaginal deliveries?
Comment: How many vaginal deliveries {have you/has SP} had?  {Please count stillbirths as well as live births}
Note: COUNT THE NUMBER OF DELIVERIES, NOT THE NUMBER OF LIVE-BORN CHILDREN.  FOR EXAMPLE, IF SP DELIVERED TWINS OR HAD ANY OTHER MULTIPLE BIRTH, COUNT AS A SINGLE DELIVERY. SOFT EDIT:  If currently pregnant (coded '1' in RHD143) then the sum of RHQ166 and RHQ169 should be less than or equal to RHQ160 minus 1. Error Message:  'Since SP is currently pregnant, it is unlikely that the number of vaginal and cesarean deliveries is equal to or greater than the number of pregnancies.  Please verify.' ENTER NUMBER.

Label: How many cesarean deliveries?
Comment: How many cesarean deliveries {have you/has SP} had?  (Cesarean deliveries are also known as C-sections.)  (Please count stillbirths as well as live births.)
Note: COUNT THE NUMBER OF DELIVERIES, NOT THE NUMBER OF LIVE-BORN CHILDREN.  FOR EXAMPLE, IF SP DELIVERED TWINS OR HAD ANY OTHER MULTIPLE BIRTH, COUNT AS A SINGLE DELIVERY.  ENTER NUMBER.

Label: Any babies weigh 9 lbs or more?
Comment: {Did {your/SP's} delivery/Did any of {your/SP's} deliveries} result in a baby that weighed 9 pounds (4082 g) or more at birth?  (Please count stillbirths as well as live births.)
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF SP HAD ONE DELIVERY (SUM OF RHQ166 AND RHQ169 = 1), DISPLAY {YOUR DELIVERY}. IF SP HAD MORE THAN ONE DELIVERY (SUM OF RHQ166 AND RHQ169 > 1), DISPLAY {ANY OF YOUR DELIVERIES}.

Label: Age when delivered baby 9 lbs or more?
Comment: How old {were you/was SP} when {you/she} delivered a baby that weighed 9 pounds or more?  (Please count stillbirths as well as live births.)
Note: [IF MORE THAN 1 BABY WEIGHED 9 POUNDS OR MORE RECORD AGE FOR FIRST ONE] HARD EDIT: RHQ173 must be equal to or less than age of SP. Error message: 'Age cannot be greater than age of SP.' ENTER AGE IN YEARS.

Label: How many deliveries live birth result?
Comment: How many of {your/her} deliveries resulted {Did {your/her} delivery result} in a live birth?
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF SP HAD ONE DELIVERY (SUM OF RHQ166 AND RHQ169 = 1), REPLACE {How many of {your/her} deliveries resulted} WITH {Did {your/her} delivery result}. COUNT THE NUMBER OF TOTAL DELIVERIES, NOT NUMBER OF LIVE-BORN CHILDREN. FOR EXAMPLE, IF SP HAD TWINS OR OTHER MULTIPLE BIRTH, COUNT AS SINGLE DELIVERY. ENTER NUMBER OF DELIVERIES.

Label: Age at first live birth
Comment: How old {were you/was SP} at the time of {your/her} first live birth?

Label: Age at last live birth
Comment: How old {were you/was SP} at the time of {your/her} last live birth?
Note: English Instructions: CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF SP HAD MORE THAN 1 LIVE BIRTH (CODED >= 2) IN RHQ171, DISPLAY {LAST}. HARD EDIT: RHQ190 MUST BE EQUAL TO OR LESS THAN AGE OF SP. ERROR MESSAGE: 'AGE OF SP AT LAST DELIVERY CANNOT BE GREATER THAN AGE OF SP.' HARD EDIT: RHQ190 CANNOT BE LESS THAN RHQ180. ERROR MESSAGE: 'AGE OF SP AT LAST LIVE BIRTH CANNOT BE LESS THAN AGE OF SP AT FIRST LIVE BIRTH.' ENTER AGE IN YEARS.

Label: How many months ago have baby?
Comment: How many months ago did {you/SP} have {your/her} baby?

Label: Now breastfeeding a child?
Comment: {Are you/Is SP} now breast feeding a child?

Label: Had a hysterectomy?
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} had a hysterectomy that is, surgery to remove {your/her} uterus or womb?

Label: Age when had hysterectomy
Comment: How old {were you/was SP} when {you/she} had {your/her} (hysterectomy/uterus removed/womb removed)?

Label: Had both ovaries removed?
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} had both of {your/her} ovaries removed (either when {you/she} had {your/her} uterus removed or at another time)?

Label: Age when both ovaries removed
Comment: How old {were you/was SP} when {you/she} had {your/her} ovaries removed or last ovary removed if removed at different times?

Label: Ever taken birth control pills?
Comment: Now I am going to ask you about {your/SP's} birth control history.  {Have you/Has SP} ever taken birth control pills for any reason?

Label: Ever use female hormones?
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} ever used female hormones such as estrogen and progesterone?  Please include any forms of female hormones, such as pills, cream, patch, and injectables, but do not include birth control methods or use for infertility.

Label: Hormone pills used
Comment: Which forms of female hormones {have you/has SP} used.

Label: Hormone patches used
Comment: Which forms of female hormones {have you/has SP} used.

Label: Hormone cream/suppository/injection used
Comment: Which forms of female hormones {have you/has SP} used.

Label: Other form of female hormone used
Comment: Which forms of female hormones {have you/has SP} used.

Label: Use hormone pills w/estrogen only
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} ever taken female hormone pills containing estrogen only (like Premarin)? (Do not include birth control pills.)

Label: How long taking estrogen-only pills?
Comment: Not counting any time when {you/SP} stopped taking them, for how long altogether {have you taken/did you take/has she taken/did she take} pills containing estrogen only?
Note: CODE '1' FOR LESS THAN 1 MONTH.  ENTER NUMBER.

Label: Unit of measure: months, years
Comment: UNIT OF MEASURE.

Label: Used estrogen/progestin combo pills
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} taken female hormone pills containing both estrogen and progestin (like Prempro, Premphase)? (Do not include birth control pills.)

Label: How long taking estrogen/progestin?
Comment: Not counting any time when {you/SP} stopped taking them, for how long altogether {{have you/has SP} taken/did {you/SP} take} pills containing both estrogen and progestin?
Note: CODE '1' FOR LESS THAN 1 MONTH.  ENTER NUMBER.

Label: Unit of measure: months, years
Comment: UNIT OF MEASURE.

Label: Used estrogen-only patches?
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} ever used female hormone patches containing estrogen only?

Label: How long using estrogen only patches?
Comment: Not counting any time when {you/SP} stopped taking them, for how long altogether {have you used/did you use/has she used/did she use} patches containing estrogen only?
Note: CODE '1' FOR LESS THAN 1 MONTH.  ENTER NUMBER.

Label: Unit of measure: months, years
Comment: UNIT OF MEASURE.

Label: Used estrogen/progestin combo patches?
Comment: {Have you/Has SP} used female hormone patches containing both estrogen and progestin?

Label: How long use estrogen/progestin patch
Comment: Not counting any time when {you/SP} stopped taking them, for how long altogether {have you used/did you use/has she used/did she use} patches containing both estrogen and progestin?
Note: CODE '1' FOR LESS THAN 1 MONTH.  ENTER NUMBER.

Label: Unit of measure: months, years
Comment: UNIT OF MEASURE.
